duties_responsibilities.duty: Plans, organizes, and directs all functions of hospital pharmacy services, ensuring legal, regulatory, and accrediting requirements are maintained.
Manages pharmacy budget and financial program, including profit and loss responsibility.
Participates in hospital committee meetings and conducts one-on-one and team meetings with pharmacy staff for performance review and coaching.
Purchases drugs and supplies in accordance with best demonstrated practices and maintains and updates a pharmacy Policy and Procedure manual.
Oversees pharmacy scheduling, hiring, firing, and performance management of pharmacy staff members.
Performs pharmacy-related tasks including filling and taking orders in compliance with departmental policies and procedures.

education_certification.credential: Pharmacy Degree (B.S. or PharmD) with an active California state pharmacist license (or ability to obtain prior to employment)
